item.description:
Hello fellow small dog lovers.....We will be meeting at a new location. Member MaryEllen has graciously opened her back yard for play and fun for our next meeting. MaryEllens back yard is fenced in - so no worries! Directions are as follows:

From No. Attleboro
Follow Rte 152 to Attleboro Center
Continue on 152 South past train station and under arch bridge where road
veers sharply right.
Next traffic light - look for St. Josephs Church
Directly after St. Josephs Church - take 2nd left onto Orange Street
Follow Orange St to 3rd stop sign - take right onto Hazel St.
Take next left onto Brownell St.
#81 Brownell - brick wall on right - White Colonial w/red shutters
Walk up driveway to garage gate to backyard on left.

From South of Attleboro
I 95 to Exit 3A (Rte 123)
Follow 123 East
2nd traffic light - stay in left land to follow 123 East
Pass Capron Park
3rd traffic light - turn right
Next traffic light - turn right onto 152
Take 2nd left onto Orange St.
Follow Orange St to 3rd stop sign - take right onto Hazel St.
Take next left onto Brownell St.
#81 Brownell - Brick wall on right - White Colonial w/red shutters
Walk up driveway to garage gate to backyard on left.

Hope you all can make it! Look forward to seeing you there!

Your sponsor,

Linda Z.

group.name: The North Attleboro Small Breed Dogs Meetup Group

item.name: The North Attleboro Small Breed Dogs July Meetup
